excerpt: https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.03134 ## Training - Create a dataset: `python3 data.py` - Training: `python3 run_training.py` ## Inference - Run: `python3 predict_convex_hull.py -c ckpts/hk_state_0099999.ckpt -d 256 -l 200 -s 42` ## Attention hidden subspace + Checkout `01-pca-attention.ipynb` for the details. + Encoder attention hidden states are in a 2d plane which is a 1-to-1 mapping from the point space. + Decoder attention hidden states go around a circle in the 2d hidden plane.

citation.excerpt: This is an unofficial implementation of the research paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.03134

description.excerpt: Encoder attention hidden states are in a 2d plane which is a 1-to-1 mapping from the point space.
An unofficial implementation of pointer networks.

invocation.excerpt:
Create a dataset: python3 data.py 
Training: python3 run_training.py 
Run: python3 predict_convex_hull.py -c ckpts/hk_state_0099999.ckpt -d 256 -l 200 -s 42
